newsitem.title: FRANCE: SOCCER-PIRES INJURED, OUT FOR MONTH.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-PIRES INJURED, OUT FOR MONTH.

text.p: France international winger Robert Pires, who has been courted by both Newcastle United and Paris St Germain, will be out of action for a month after twisting his knee.
Pires, who will miss France's friendly international against Sweden at home on April 2, turned awkwardly on his right knee near the end of his club Metz's 0-0 draw at Cannes on Saturday.
"It's worse news for Metz than for France," said France coach Aime Jacquet, who can expect to have Pires fit for the Tournoi de France World Cup warm-up tournament in June.
